nodes.text: Permanent Demotion was a scenario for Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic, that was added to Wizards.com on December 2, 2008. It was the continuation of a story began in a previous scenario, Czerka 431. It was written by Sterling Hershey.

After the fallout of Battle of Czerka 431, Joni Ree is supporting the Galactic Republic in investigating Czerka Lab AB-343. The Sith are dedicated to eliminating her, and send a Sith assassin. The GenoHaradan come to the same conclusion.
The scenario can end either with the Republic repelling the assassins or with Ree's death.
